mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysAdminUseLog Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ADMIN_ID , MENU_SN , CONECT_DT , CONECT_IP FROM SYS_ADMIN_USE_LOG WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysAdminUseLog Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_ADMIN_USE_LOG WHERE 1 = 1
